## Code Examples

R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

Setup **code**:

```{r}
data("mtcars")
head(mtcars)
y = mtcars$mpg
x = cbind(1, mtcars$wt, mtcars$hp)
head(x)
```

## Least squares.

Fit with least squares.

```{r}
solve( t(x) %*% x ) %*% t(x) %*% y
```

R does the same using `lm`

```{r}
coef( lm( mpg ~ wt + hp, data=mtcars ))
```
